attributes.action: introduce legislation at the earliest opportunity so that taxpayer funding of the Met Office will be reduced commensurate with the lower amount of work being done as a result of their inability to achieve any level of accuracy in long term forecasting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This week's acknowledgement of its failure and that they will no longer attempt long term forecasting is a HUGE reduction in the amount of work being done by the staff at the Met Office.  It follows, therefore, that the taxpayer funding of the organisation should be HUGELY reduced and this needs to happen immediately.

rejection.details: This petition reads as opinion presented as fact
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
